TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
I pop in to check on the thread and...what? I'm floating in space...In Jool orbit...next to a ramshackle ship... that cooks with EVA suits for pots and such...And have a ninja with a grappling hook flying towards me...

I am very much amused.
Great ,also want a big stack of this swiss choclate that i can't pronounce.After all us Industrialist states all ways mass produce everything to sell.(Shipping take like 3 years thought)

Oh the utter Chaos seems to be spreading onto this thread *sits in chair drinks chocolate milk from cotton candy clouds that rain chocolate rain.* *throws in away* *boom!*

Fair and final warning: If this thread descends any further into Chaos, it will be crushed out of existing for good.

Rage that means you too, I saw that reaction image a little while ago.

We'll be good Odin. WON'T WE, YOU GUYS?

So, where is everyone? I know Rage is in Texas (do you have a cute drawl and a cowboy hat?), y'all know Chobit and I are in the great white north...

well actually it going into a rolepalying space adventure with chobit. so odin don't worry were in space were harmony thrives.

Edit:I live in the west coast in California were everything seems to be turning into a desert.

We'll be good Odin. WON'T WE, YOU GUYS?

So, where is everyone? I know Rage is in Texas (do you have a cute drawl and a cowboy hat?), y'all know Chobit and I are in the great white north...

...No. I actually constantly wear a hoodie and jeans regardless of temperature and glasses. Because computer screens+ Glasses for near-sighted people apparently don't mix. who would've thought?
Hey now! Don't you dare pin it on me! I posted TWICE!

hey rage here is some water ,since you might be thirsty from being in a vacuum for like 5 min.Don't ask why we got 100+ gallons of water,but lets just say the Industrial States.

Edit:Your part of an adventure since this thread was going to have a fly-by also im saying we are not going into a chaotic state ,but a harmonious state.Plus will you liek to have this shipment of trombones ,saying this because i can't say the name of Swiss chocolate it is to hard.

Edited June 5, 2013 by MGUARN

...No. I actually constantly wear a hoodie and jeans regardless of temperature and glasses. Because computer screens+ Glasses for near-sighted people apparently don't mix. who would've thought?

So... you're Sheldon Cooper with glasses?
well that fellow feels emotion unlike Sheldon who sometimes seems to have trouble showing emotions ...wait i think that is cybermen oops wrong show then carry on.

well actually it going into a rolepalying space adventure with chobit. so odin don't worry were in space were harmony thrives.

That's exactly what shouldn't be happening. This thread is not for roleplaying, it is for casual chat similar to what happens on the IRC- but here on the forum so that it is easier for people to reach it. Roleplaying in general is officially discouraged forumwide due to problems in the past, although you are welcome to take it to other sites.

hmm...okay on it *initiates new topi program*

So what is the weather in your area?

So... you're Sheldon Cooper with glasses?

This pretty much descibes me:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U7DFsBcVMDA

hmm...okay on it *initiates new topi program*

So what is the weather in your area?

Cloudy

So... you're Sheldon Cooper with glasses?

Actually, EVERYBODY says I look like Dr. Crayne from Batman.

Replace his glasses with these:

Give him a younger and more rebellious face and you've got me.

It's close enough to where everyone calls me scarecrow.

Edited June 5, 2013 by Rage097
Umm....is that were all there taxes have been going to a video.
Sorry, can't hear you over the sound of USAF planes falling apart despite being the world's most expensive military

<.<

>.>

not my fault, i did not throw that rock into your engine.
...ignored ;_;
Yes you are Rage, nobody cares bout you

*pats rage on the cold hard steel body of his* Well at least i didn't throw the cheese.....Anywho *Fires the Party cannon* well it is going to 4th of july ,and i feel like wasting the world supply of streamers.

Yes you are Rage, nobody cares bout you

How kind. I truly appreciate it.
you forgot me stelir.

Sorry, can't hear you over the sound of USAF planes falling apart despite being the world's most expensive military

My buddies in the Air Force ROTC program (I was in the Army one in college) told me I was crazy for wanting to jump out of a perfectly good airplane.

I told them that it was a good thing they didn't have any of those left.

Things got interesting pretty quickly after that.

sounds like they did...Then again most of my life so far is interesting after all give me a hammer ,and a electronic ...well that is the last time they day....so far a day with out incident I say 0.Also I don't think I just smash it as if it poses a danger to me.
